_comment: Created by EFisher on 24/01/2014 17:05:54 using v2.0
title: How did patients describe their overall experience of making an appointment?
analysis_commentary: Overall, the majority of patients describe their experience of making an appointment as positive, however this has been showing a downward trend over time (79% in 2011/12, 76% in 2012/13 and 75% in January to September 2013).
